answers.text:
Isabelle,
CALEA (www.calea.org) is a great source for the answer to your question. Also, the Dubuque Police Department has practiced Commnunity Policing for the last 15 years. Chief of Police Mark Dalsing (mdalsing@cityofdubuque.org) would be a great source for the answer to your question. Also, former Dubuque Chief of Police Kim Wadding (kim.wadding@iowa.gov) now works at the Iowa Law Enforcement Academy and would be another good source.
Feel free to contact me if I can help.
Mike

author: Isabelle Bully-Omictin
text:
ICMA International is implementing a program in Mexico in which one of the components is to promote police reform and institutional changes  to build a more effective and efficient police force and one which embraces community policing.  Can anyone share with us their management policies which can serve as guidelines for the Mexican counterparts? I would also appreciate receiving information on specific policies and programs in crime prevention through environmental design that you have implemented.
Thank you!
title: Management Policies of Police Departments
